description: Coming from a wealthy family, Rich grew up entitled. Something that his parents agreed was a bit of a problem. So they sent him to the countryside hamlet of Herbaburg to build character and make something off himself. He spent his savings to set up his own flower trade. It is not going well. And his neighbor is doing better selling honey of all things. This had led to a sort of hostile rivalry with old Beekeeper Ben, a rivalry he may have taken a bit too far at times.
name: Rich the Florist
